attributes.action: stop politicians from having expenses accounts which are larger than a lot of families' annual wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a party which is supposed to subscribe to the idea of socialism, it seems more appropriate to spread the nation's wealth more fairly. Currently, MPs have expenses accounts which are in excess of many families' whole annual incomes, and this is on top of a very comfortable wage. This is not fair and the people wish it to stop.
